main event: A witness observed a blue object in the sky from their apartment in Atlanta, Georgia, on 4 February 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as slightly larger than a full moon and blue in color,The witness reported that the object moved downwards and then glowed red,The observer felt drawn to the object and nearly fainted from the experience,The witness's brother-in-law contacted Dobbins Air Force Base, but they had no record of the sighting,The report concludes that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a blue object in the sky
witness description: 17-year-old female resident who observed the object from her apartment.
